story_teamplasma_01_04000/2401_1001_0200:
When Elesa invited me, I said OK ’cause I thought
we were gonna battle!
story_teamplasma_01_04000/2401_1001_0300:
I didn’t realize she was actually inviting me to be
in a fashion show...
story_teamplasma_01_04000/2401_1001_0400:
You’re always so confident, Hilda. So even you
get nervous sometimes?
story_teamplasma_01_04000/2401_1001_0500: Of course! My heart was pounding like crazy!
story_teamplasma_01_04000/2401_1001_0800:
N isn’t the kind of person to say he’d come and
then not show up... I wonder what’s up.
story_teamplasma_01_04000/2401_1001_0900:
We searched the arena too, but we didn’t
see him...
story_teamplasma_01_04000/2401_1001_1000:
Hugh isn’t here either. He swore he would
be here!
story_teamplasma_01_04000/2401_1001_1200: Oh ho! Could it be you’re looking for someone?
story_teamplasma_01_04000/2401_1001_1400:
If it’s about the boy with spiky hair like a Qwilfish,
I think I have an idea where he went!
story_teamplasma_01_04000/2401_1001_1600:
Yes! I saw him chasing Team Plasma sometime
before the show started!
story_teamplasma_01_04000/2401_1001_1700: Team Plasma?! Why didn’t you stop him?
story_teamplasma_01_04000/2401_1001_1900: But he went anyway, so I came to tell you!
story_teamplasma_01_04000/2401_1001_2000: Hugh went missing chasing after Team Plasma...
story_teamplasma_01_04000/2401_1001_2100: That doesn’t sound like good news.
story_teamplasma_01_04000/2401_1001_2200: That might have something to do with N’s absence.
story_teamplasma_01_04000/2401_1001_2300: Let’s look for them at once!
story_teamplasma_01_04000/2401_1001_2400: Do you mind if I tag along? I’d like to help!
story_teamplasma_01_04000/2401_1001_2500:
Furthermore, your behavior is so fascinating!
Allow me to observe it up close!
story_teamplasma_01_04000/2401_1001_2600: OK! Could you take us to where you saw Hugh?
